original_title: Andel's Story 2: The Running of the Bulls
overview: 4 HOURS OF BREATH TAKING MAGNIFICENCE IN SPAIN! Master Director, Wim Hof and the brilliant eye of Pavel Nikos, take 10 of the most beautiful men from the Czech Republic to Pamplona, Spain to film ANDELS STORY #2: RUNNING OF THE BULLS. This two volume set contains actual footage of these Czech gods who are brave and bold enough to participate in the traditional running of the bulls through the streets of Pamplona. The non-stop sex and passion from these men explode on the screen with a passion that is nothing like you've seen before.  Adding to the stunning and breathtaking beauty of the Spanish countryside is the beautiful Andel, the stunning Pavel Dubcek, and handsome newcomer Pavel Korsakov and their friends on this journey of unleashed man sex.
title: Andel's Story 2: The Running of the Bulls
